lead_paragraph: While the growth rate was revised upward, it still represents a sharp slowdown from a 3.7 percent rate in the first quarter.
snippet: While the growth rate was revised upward, it still represents a sharp slowdown from a 3.7 percent rate in the first quarter.

headline.main: Second-Quarter Growth Is Revised Higher, to 1.7%
headline.seo: U.S. Growth in Second Quarter Revised Slightly Higher
headline.print_headline: Second-Quarter Growth Is Revised Higher, to 1.7%
